revision.text: The '''Explosive Charge''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it causes new mining layers in the [[Underground]] to start with damaged tiles. Any tiles it affects have a single layer removed. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pok√©mon and instead can be bought from the [[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Cinnabar Island Shop]] in [[Kanto]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
